displayName.brazilian: Uma sinfonia de conquistas de terror

description.english: You collected all achievements in Until Dawn
description.german: Du hast alle Gold-, Silber- und Bronze- Erfolge in Until Dawn gesammelt.
description.french: Vous avez obtenu tous les succès Or, Argent et Bronze dans Until Dawn.
description.italian: Hai ottenuto tutti gli obiettivi Oro, Argento e Bronzo in Until Dawn
description.koreana: Until Dawn에서 골드, 실버, 브론즈 도전 과제를 모두 달성했습니다.
description.spanish: Has conseguido todos los logros de oro, plata y bronce en Until Dawn.
description.schinese: 已收集《Until Dawn》中全部金、银和铜成就
description.tchinese: 您已收集《Until Dawn》中的所有金、銀、銅成就
description.russian: Вы добились всех золотых, серебряных и бронзовых достижений в игре
description.japanese: ゴールド、シルバー、ブロンズの全ての実績を取得した
description.portuguese: Obtiveste todas as conquistas de Ouro, Prata e Bronze do Until Dawn.
description.polish: Zdobyto wszystkie złote, srebrne i brązowe osiągnięcia dostępne w Until Dawn
description.danish: Du har samlet alle guld-, sølv- og bronze-bedrifter i Until Dawn
description.dutch: Je hebt alle bronzen, zilveren en gouden prestaties van Until Dawn verzameld
description.finnish: Keräsit Until Dawnin kaikki kulta-, hopea- ja pronssisaavutukset
description.norwegian: Du har samlet alle gull-, sølv- og bronseprestasjonene i Until Dawn.
description.swedish: Du samlade alla guld-, silver- och bronsachievements i Until Dawn.
description.turkish: Until Dawn'ın tüm Altın, Gümüş ve Bronz başarımlarını aldın
description.brazilian: Você obteve todas as conquistas de bronze, prata e ouro de Until Dawn
description.latam: Obtuviste todos los logros de oro, plata y bronce de Until Dawn.

displayName.italian: Un uomo lupo pieno di risorse

description.english: Mike kept the wolf alive throughout the Sanatorium
description.german: Mike hat den Wolf die ganze Zeit im Sanatorium am Leben gehalten.
description.french: Mike est parvenu à garder le loup en vie au sanatorium.
description.italian: Mike ha tenuto in vita il lupo durante la sezione del Sanatorio
description.schinese: 迈克成功在疗养院剧情中让狼存活到最后
description.tchinese: 麥可在整個療養度假中心探索過程中讓狼保持存活
description.russian: Майк сумел сберечь волка в лечебнице.
description.japanese: マイクが療養所を出るまで狼は生きていた
description.portuguese: O Mike manteve o lobo vivo durante a passagem pelo sanatório.
description.polish: Mike utrzymał wilka przy życiu w sanatorium
description.danish: Mike holdt ulven i live gennem hele sanatoriet
description.dutch: Mike heeft de wolf in het sanatorium in leven gehouden.
description.finnish: Mike piti suden hengissä koko parantolan läpi
description.norwegian: Mike holdt ulven i live gjennom sanatoriet.
description.swedish: Mike höll vargen vid liv genom hela vårdhemmet.
description.turkish: Mike, Sanatoryum boyunca kurdu hayatta tuttu
description.spanish: Mike mantuvo al lobo con vida en el manicomio.
description.brazilian: Mike manteve o lobo vivo no Sanatório
description.latam: Mike mantuvo al lobo con vida en el manicomio.

description.english: The group found all the clues from the Twins Clueline
description.german: Die Gruppe hat alle Hinweise der „Die Zwillinge“-Hinweiskette gefunden.
description.french: Le groupe a trouvé tous les indices dans la Piste des jumelles.

description.tchinese: 一行人找到了雙胞胎姊妹線索系列的所有線索

description.english: Nobody survived until dawn
description.german: Niemand hat bis zum Morgen überlebt.

description.schinese: 无人活到黎明
description.tchinese: 無人生存至黎明到來

description.japanese: 夜が明ける前に全員が死亡した
description.portuguese: Ninguém sobreviveu até ao amanhecer.

description.danish: Ingen overlevede til daggry

displayName.french: Dans les griffes de la nuit
displayName.japanese: アシュリー通りの悪夢

description.english: Ashley hesitated and failed to let Chris inside in time

description.portuguese: A Ashley hesitou e não deixou o Chris entrar a tempo.
description.polish: Ashley zawahała się i nie wpuściła Chrisa do środka na czas
description.danish: Ashley tøvede og lukkede ikke Chris ind i tide

description.norwegian: Ashley nølte og fikk ikke Chris inn i tide.

description.brazilian: Ashley hesitou e não deixou Chris entrar a tempo
description.latam: Ashley dudó y no dejó entrar a Chris a tiempo.

description.english: Matt and Jessica were the only ones to survive until dawn

displayName.japanese: フェイタル・デスティネーション

description.english: Despite Dr. Hill’s warning, you tried changing the past
description.german: Trotz Dr. Hills Warnung hast du versucht, die Vergangenheit zu ändern.
description.french: En dépit de l'avertissement du Dr Hill, vous avez tenté de changer le passé.
description.italian: Nonostante l'avvertimento del dottor Hill, hai provato a cambiare il passato
description.koreana: 힐 박사의 경고를 무시하고 과거를 바꾸려고 했습니다.
description.spanish: A pesar de la advertencia del Dr. Hill, trataste de cambiar el pasado.
description.schinese: 你不顾希尔医生的警告，执意要改变过去
description.tchinese: 您不顧希爾醫師警告，還是試圖改變過去
description.russian: Несмотря на предостережение доктора Хилла, вы попытались изменить прошлое.
description.japanese: ドクター・ヒルの警告を無視し、過去を変えようとした
description.portuguese: Apesar do aviso do Dr. Hill, tentaste mudar o passado.
description.polish: Pomimo ostrzeżenia dr. Hilla spróbowano zmienić przeszłość

description.dutch: Ondanks de waarschuwing van Dr. Hill heb je geprobeerd het verleden te veranderen.
description.finnish: Yritit muuttaa menneisyyttä tohtori Hillin varoituksesta piittaamatta
description.norwegian: Til tross for doktor Hills advarsel forsøkte du å forandre fortiden.
description.swedish: Trots varningen från dr Hill försökte du förändra det förflutna.
description.turkish: Dr. Hill'in uyarılarına rağmen geçmişi değiştirmeye çalıştın
description.brazilian: Apesar do aviso do Dr. Hill, você tentou mudar o passado
description.latam: Pese a la advertencia del Dr. Hill, intentaste cambiar el pasado.

description.english: Mike saved Jessica from an unknown attacker without failing a quick time event
description.german: Mike hat Jessica vor einem unbekannten Angreifer gerettet, ohne bei einem Quick-Time-Event zu scheitern.
description.french: Mike a sauvé Jessica d'un assaillant inconnu sans échouer au QTE.
description.italian: Mike ha salvato Jessica da un assalitore sconosciuto senza fallire nessun quick time event
description.koreana: 마이크가 퀵 타임 이벤트에서 실패하지 않고 신원불명의 공격자에게서 제시카를 구출했습니다.
description.spanish: Mike salvó a Jessica de un atacante desconocido sin fallar ni un solo evento de tiempo rápido.
description.schinese: 迈克成功完成所有快速反应事件，从不明攻击者手中救下了杰西卡
description.tchinese: 麥可將潔西卡從不明攻擊者手中救了出來，並且沒有在快速反應事件中失敗
description.russian: Майк спас Джессику от неизвестного врага, не допустив ошибок в QTE-сцене.
description.japanese: マイクはQTEに失敗することなく、ジェスを謎の襲撃者から救った
description.portuguese: O Mike salvou a Jessica de um atacante desconhecido sem falhar um evento Quick Time.
description.polish: Mike ocalił Jessicę przed nieznanym napastnikiem bez ponoszenia porażki w sekwencji QTE
description.danish: Mike reddede Jessica fra en ukendt angriber uden at forkludre en eneste QTE
description.dutch: Mike redde Jessica van een onbekende aanvaller zonder dat het QTE mislukte.
description.finnish: Mike pelasti Jessican tuntemattomalta hyökkääjältä epäonnistumatta aikarajoitetussa tapahtumassa
description.norwegian: Mike reddet Jessica fra en ukjent angriper uten å mislykkes med et hurtigevent.
description.swedish: Mike räddade Jessica från den okända angriparen utan att missa en enda QTE-sekvens.
description.turkish: Mike, QTE'de başarısız olmadan Jessica'yı kimliği belirsiz saldırgandan kurtardı
description.brazilian: Mike salvou Jessica de um agressor desconhecido sem falhar em nenhum evento de ação rápida
description.latam: Mike salvó a Jessica de un atacante desconocido sin fallar ni un solo evento de acción rápida.

description.english: Emily slapped Ashley after the truth was revealed
